title: How to Make French Toast with Sliced Cinnamon Apple

steps.headline: Melt the butter in a saucepan.
Combine the sugar, cinnamon, and apple slices in the saucepan.
steps.description: Cook until the apple is soft. Remove from the heat, but keep it warm.

steps.headline: Cut off the bread crusts.
steps.description: Thoroughly dip the bread into the beaten egg until well coated.

steps.headline: Fry the bread in a separate saucepan until golden brown.
Serve the french toast with a layer of the cinnamon apple slices.
steps.description: Slowly pour any sauce from the apple mixture on top.

text: Melt the butter in a saucepan.  Combine the sugar, cinnamon, and apple slices in the saucepan. Cook until the apple is soft. Remove from the heat, but keep it warm. Cut off the bread crusts. Thoroughly dip the bread into the beaten egg until well coated. Fry the bread in a separate saucepan until golden brown.  Serve the french toast with a layer of the cinnamon apple slices. Slowly pour any sauce from the apple mixture on top.
